subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Larry Brown, who coached the Knicks for one turbulent season, left his imprint, for better or worse, on the team’s bench in the form of his coaching protégés: assistants Dave Hanners and Phil Ford.
snippet: Larry Brown, who coached the Knicks for one turbulent season, left his imprint, for better or worse, on the team’s bench in the form of his coaching protégés: assistants Dave Hanners and Phil Ford.
